description:
Himejima Gyoumei is a Demon Slayer and the Stone Pillar of the http://anidb.net/ch104028 [Demon Slaying Corps]. He is confirmed to be the strongest Demon Slayer by http://anidb.net/ch99456 [Hashibira Inosuke] and http://anidb.net/ch99458 [Kamado Tanjirou].
Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki
name: Himejima Gyoumei
